JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Painter

Be Part of Building the Future:

Skilled Painters Needed for Køge Hospital Project!

Join a team making history! Køge Hospital Project Team I/S, owned by Italian Itinera Group and CMB, is searching for experienced painters to help bring our state-of-the-art hospital to life. This is your chance to contribute to a project that will positively impact countless lives for years to come.

What you'll do:

  • Apply your expertise in plastering, painting, varnishing to interior surfaces and protect the beauty and functionality of the hospital.
  • Collaborate with a skilled team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
  • Take pride in your work, knowing you're directly contributing to a vital community project.

Why join us:

  • Competitive salary and benefits: Enjoy an hourly wage aligned with industry standards, a pension scheme with a generous company contribution, and the security of a collective agreement.
  • Work with the best: Be part of the Itinera Group, a global leader in large-scale infrastructure projects. Gain valuable experience while working alongside top professionals.
  • Make a difference: Contribute to a project that will serve the community for generations. See the tangible impact of your work on people's lives.
  • Long-term opportunity: This project extends until the end of 2025, offering job stability and the chance to see the project through to completion

What we offer:

  • Insight into a multicultural and multilingual Company;
  • Salary according to the current collective agreement;

 If you think you have the right skills to be part of this great project in an exciting international environment, please do not hesitate to send us your application.

About Køge Hospital Project Team I/S (KHPT):


KHPT is a joint venture between Itinera and CMB, two Italian companies with experience in building hospitals.

The Køge Hospital Project is an expansion of the already existing University Hospital in Køge, which will include a complete renovation. When the renovation is complete, it will open to extended special departments, along with new departments for research, which will gather Zealand University Hospital under one single roof. When the work is finished the hospital will be 195.000 sq.m.
